turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a drink from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Which Starbucks do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2255 Sheridan Blvd - Edgewater

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! What drink do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Skim

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to customize your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! What do you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a skinny mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Is there anything else you need to add to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Your grande iced skinny mocha with skim milk is ordered. You can pick it up at the Starbucks at 2255 Sheridan - Edgewater in 15 minutes.
